title: BreadcrumbConfig
description: Configuration for breadcrumb navigation display, specifying path generation rules, separator styles, truncation behavior, and home link settings. Applied globally to define breadcrumb rendering for a navigation scope rather than attached per individual Route. Provides users with location context and navigation history.

labelTemplate.description: Template string for dynamic label generation using {title} placeholder syntax to interpolate route metadata. Used when breadcrumb labels need to vary by route context rather than a static label.
